response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand its importance to you, valued at $1,200,000, and aim to honor this by offering it to you at a competitive price. Our proposal is as follows: $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to providing exceptional value while ensuring a fair return on our investment. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 950000}
